events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your software development experience and skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted to discuss your software development background and relevant technical skills.
You responded promptly to the interviewer's questions and expressed enthusiasm about contributing to the engineering projects.
A technical interview has been scheduled for you to assess your coding capabilities and problem-solving skills in a live environment.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance in algorithms and system design questions.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your cultural fit, company values, and employment terms following your technical success.
The HR interview went well, with positive feedback on your alignment with company values and team collaboration skills.
An official offer has been extended to you including competitive salary and comprehensive benefits to join our engineering team.
You provided positive feedback on the offer details and expressed excitement about the prospect of joining our software engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, confirming your commitment to join our team and start the onboarding process.
Your onboarding journey has begun with orientation sessions to familiarize you with our engineering workflows and team culture.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with you fully onboarded as a Software Engineer in our development department.
